Dropdown context

Example
  • Add spanish 
<div x-data="{ languages: ['english', 'swedish', 'korean', 'german', 'icelandic', 'japanese']}" class="flex justify-center">
  <template x-for="(language, index) in languages">
    <div x-text="language" @contextmenu.prevent="$dispatch('open-contextmenu', {id: 'context', data: { index, language, languages }, $event })" class="mr-4 cursor-pointer border p-2 hover:bg-gray-50 dark:border-neutral-700 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700">
    </div>
  </template>
</div>

<div x-data="dropdownContext" id="context">
  <div x-bind="menu" x-cloak class="z-20 shadow-md rounded-md">
    <div
      class="w-[320px] rounded-md border border-gray-200 bg-white shadow-md dark:border-neutral-700 dark:bg-neutral-800 dark:text-gray-300"
    >
      <ul>
        <li>
          <a x-text="'Set ' + contextData?.language" href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block">
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
          <a @click="contextData.languages.push('spanish')" href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block">
            Add spanish
          </a>
        </li>
        <li>
        <a x-text="'Remove ' + contextData?.language" @click="contextData.languages.splice(contextData.index, 1)" href="#" class="my-1 w-full px-6 py-3 pr-4 text-left text-sm text-gray-800 hover:bg-gray-100 focus:bg-violet-500 focus:text-white focus:outline-none dark:text-gray-300 dark:hover:bg-neutral-700 dark:focus:bg-violet-500 dark:focus:text-white block"></a>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

Usage

To use this component simply copy and paste minimal template or any template from the examples below.

The data for the component is provided by the dropdownContext function in the x-data directive. This function takes two object arguments: the props and floatingUI options.

dropdownContext({
    autoClose: Boolean,
},
{
    placement: String,
    offsetX: Number,
    offsetY: Number,
    flip: Boolean,
    autoPlacement: Boolean,
    inline: Boolean,
})
autoClose
true Boolean

If true menu is closed after click on any element inside.

placement
bottom-start String

Initial placement of dropdown content. See floatingUI documentation for valid values.

offsetX
0 Number

Offset of dropdown relative to reference element.

offsetY
0 Number

Offset of dropdown relative to reference element.

flip
false Boolean

Allows fliping of the dropdown to the opposite placement if outside of current view.

autoPlacement
false Boolean

Automatically calculates best placement for the floating element.

inline
false Boolean

To show context menu simply dispatch open-contextmenu event. The data in the event should be an object with following properties:

  • id of the context menu to show
  • context data
  • event to calculate position of the context menu
